alert.note: Alert for Travis; Williamson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 23 at 6:29PM CDT until May 23 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN WILLIAMSON AND NORTHWESTERN TRAVIS COUNTIES... At 629 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lago Vista, or near Cedar Park, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Austin, Cedar Park, Anderson Mill, Leander, Lakeway, Lago Vista, Bee Cave, Hudson Bend, The Hills, Mansfield Dam, Jonestown, Point Venture, Volente, Lost Creek and Jollyville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
